basic.blooming: Flowering period April-May, viewing period 1-2 weeks
basic.color: Flower color blue purple, dotted with yellow or brown

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Likes adequate sunshine, also resistant to half shade, avoid strong light
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply fertilizers once every 10-15 days in spring
maintenance.pruning: Remove withered flowers, old, diseased, and dead leaves timely
